about_the_game:
THE GAME
Ever wanted to be a light and purify the world from evil spirits? Well, I hope you already are, but if not, you can play as one! Hexdo is a simple puzzle game. There is no score, no quests, no save games, you can just play through an endless stream of levels while listening to relaxing music.
In each level, you can choose from one of three goals:
  • Defend your shrine until the entire level has been purified.
  • Purify all the afflictions that spawn enemies from time to time.
  • Go through the gate to open the portal to the next level. Wait what?

ACCOLADES
  • "One of the greatest games ever made" - Me
  • "Very nice, sweety" - My wife
  • "AAAAAAAA" - My infant girl (I think she meant that it's a great game).

TIPS
  • You can load a new level by pressing 'R'.
  • You can zoom in and out with the scroll wheel.
  • You can skip a turn with the right mouse button.
  • You can send me an email, and I can give you a promo key as long as there are some left.
